HomePage.heading: Bienvenido a la <highlight>Wiki de Modificaciones de Minecraft</highlight>

developers.title: Autores y Desarrolladores
developers.desc: ¿Buscas escribir la documentación para un mod?

browse.title: Buscar mods
browse.desc: Navega por nuestra biblioteca de mods documentados

blog.title: Blog
blog.desc: Lee acerca de las últimas actualizaciones de la wiki

about.title: Acerca de
about.desc: Aprende más sobre cómo funciona la wiki

devs.title: Autores
devs.desc: Hospeda la documentación de tu mod en nuestra wiki

BrowsePage.no_results: ¡La consulta de búsqueda no ha devuelto resultados!

empty.primary: Looks like you haven't registered any projects yet
empty.secondary: Get started by reading our <guide>author guide</guide>.

Login.title: Login required
Login.desc: The page you are trying to access requires you to log in.
Login.prompt: Please use your GitHub account to continue.

Preview.title: Preview mode is enabled
Preview.desc: Preview mode enables a minimal user interface, allowing you to focus on drafting your docs locally before they are published.

Report.title: Reportar una página de documentación
Report.desc: Informar del contenido que viola nuestros Términos de Servicio o nuestras Normas de Contenido.
Report.contact: For contact purposes, your username (and email address, if you provide us one) will be included in the report.
Report.confidential: Your privacy is important to us, and this information will always be kept confidential.
Report.privacy: For more information, please refer to our <link>Privacy Policy</link>.

email.title: Reply email address
email.desc: (Optional) Contact email address we can use to inform you about updates on this report, or to request additional information.

reason.title: Reason*
reason.placeholder: Select a reason for reporting this page

details.title: Details*
details.placeholder: Please provide more details on why you're reporting this page. Note that empty reports will be ignored.

dislike.title: We understand that you may not like this page, and that's totally okay!
dislike.desc: Unfortunately, however, it is not a valid reason to report a project.
dislike.suggestion: Would you like to look for something else to read instead?

ProjectRegisterForm.title: Registrar proyecto
ProjectRegisterForm.desc: Registrar un nuevo proyecto en la wiki.

branch.title: Rama
branch.desc: Primary branch ref. You can specify additional branches to include in your metadata file.

path.title: Ruta a la raíz de documentación
path.desc: Path to the folder containing the metadata file.

errors.install_app: Please first install our GitHub app on your repository <link>here</link>.

success.title: Project registered successfully
success.desc: You can now navigate to the project's mod page

ProjectSettingsForm.title: Edit project
ProjectSettingsForm.desc: Editar la configuración de un proyecto existente.

success.title: Proyecto actualizado correctamente
success.desc: Ahora puede navegar a la página de mods del proyecto actualizado

ProjectDeletionForm.title: ¿Estás realmente seguro?
ProjectDeletionForm.desc: Esta acción no se puede deshacer. Esto eliminará permanentemente tu proyecto y eliminará todos los datos asociados de nuestros servidores.

ProjectRevalidateForm.title: ¿Revalidar proyecto?
ProjectRevalidateForm.primary: Todas las páginas de documentación almacenadas en caché serán repurgadas y reproducidas perezosamente bajo demanda.
ProjectRevalidateForm.secondary: Esta opción solo debería utilizarse cuando se actualice la fuente de documentación en sí.
ProjectRevalidateForm.tertiary: Para su propia comodidad, le recomendamos que vuelva a validar automáticamente los documentos después de su publicación utilizando nuestro <link>plugin de Gradle</link> en su lugar.

errors.access_denied: El usuario no tiene acceso al repositorio.
errors.invalid_meta: El archivo de metadatos no es válido
errors.no_meta: Archivo de metadatos no se ha encontrado
errors.no_cf_key: No se puede registrar el proyecto de CurseForge; falta la clave de API
errors.no_project: Platform project not found. Please make sure the metadata "slug" field is correct.
errors.internal: Internal Server Error, please try again later.
errors.insufficient_perms: Insufficient permissions to create community project

GetHelpModal.button: Is your project not showing up?
GetHelpModal.title: Project help
GetHelpModal.desc: Help resolve common issues with project registration.

app.title: Ensure the GitHub app is installed on your repository

other.title: Otros problemas
other.desc: Check the troubleshooting section of the documentation Publishing guide.

MigrateRepositoryForm.title: Migrate project repository
MigrateRepositoryForm.desc: Update repository data after its location has changed.

owner.title: Propietario antiguo
owner.desc: Usuario antiguo / nombre de la organización.

success.title: Repository migrated successfully
success.desc: You should now see the migrated projects

migrate_error.install_app: Please ensure our GitHub app is <link>installed</link> on the migrated repository.
migrate_error.unavailable: No migration available for repository. Is the entered information correct?

CommunityBadge.title: Community
CommunityBadge.desc: Unofficial documentation maintained by the community

DocsPageNotFoundError.title: We lost this page
DocsPageNotFoundError.desc: The requested documentation page is not available at the moment.
DocsPageNotFoundError.suggestion: Please try again later or report this issue to the mod author.

GetStartedModal.title: I'd like to write documentation for...

dev.title: My own mod
dev.desc: Author your own documentation and control who can make changes to it.

community.title: Someone else's mod
community.desc: Contribute to a collection of community mod docs maintained by wiki editors

DocsHomepagePlaceholder.title: Homepage placeholder
DocsHomepagePlaceholder.subtitle: Due to API restrictions, project metadata is not available for CurseForge projects in local environments.
DocsHomepagePlaceholder.replace: Don't worry! We'll replace this placeholder with the project's actual description once deployed on the live wiki website.
